      • isAccountCreationLimitReached

        public boolean isAccountCreationLimitReached(DBTransaction transaction,
                                             java.lang.String address)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                             java.io.IOException
        is account creation limit reached for recently created accounts
        Parameters:
        transaction - DBTransaction
        address - ip-address
        Returns:
        true, if too many accounts have been created recently
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of an database error
        java.io.IOException - in case of an input/output error
